messages.message: @danny.lan I noticed I no longer get eslint warnings when using `Button` (as opposed to `UnitsRequiredButton` or `NoUnitsRequiredButton` — did we change something here?

It looks like the added `no-restricted-imports` rule for `Banner` overrides the one for `Button`, but I’m not sure exactly how to keep both rules active :thinking_face:
@Liam Callanan
both rules have the same `paths.name` but also have different severities
I think we might need a custom rule but for now I can combine the rules into one `warn` rule and concat the messages
Yeah, either removing the banner rule or merging them would be ok. Depends on the choice we make here (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C05EQQJGN7L/p1720654107366789)
